itemDescription: Lord Justice of Appeal, Privy Counsellor

wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Philip Gilson Hughes, Lord Hughes of Ombersley PC,(born 11 August 1948 in St Albans, Hertfordshire) is a former English judge of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom. He was previously a Lord Justice of Appeal and Vice-President of the Criminal Division from 2009,  following the retirement of Lord Justice Latham, to 9 April 2013.

link_mentions.page: List of current members of the British Privy Council
